entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "error: out of range pc-relative fixup value" on linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable #100047
  • build.cmd fails to pick the right MSVC toolset on `1es-windows-2022-open` #100046
  • I need to modify the value of string type if the property name is "xyz" in JsonConverter<string> using System.Text.Json #100045
  • Incorrect FrameworkTarget dll is used in transitive multi-targeted ProjectReference + DisableTransitiveProjectReferences is used #100044
  • Socket.Bind does not work with any UDP port on Mac OSX #100043
  • Subset Help No Longer Works In Main Build Script #100042
    9.0.0
  • Memory leaking when calling ECDsa.Create(ECParameters) on Linux container #100037
  • Assert failure(PID 13812 [0x000035f4], Thread: 14128 [0x3730]): promoted_bytes (heap_number) == promoted #100035
  • C++/CLI x86 marshalling misses copy ctor/dtor calls resulting in C++ STL iterator debugging breaking #100033
  • System.Reflection.Emit can't call a generic method having a function pointer parameter #100020
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.Http.PipeReaderContent #100019
  • [mono] Implement UnmanagedCallersOnly support for Swift calling convention #100010
    9.0.0
  • C# compiler generates highly suboptimal code for compound assignments with struct ref variables #100008
  • Linux System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: does the library support multiple server connection? #100007
  • [Question] Is it possible that .NET 7 framework-dependent application requires specific (the latest) .NET runtime version? #100006
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to select QUIC congestion control algorithm #100003
  • System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Messages.dll doesn't have fileversion and other resources #99997
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonElement.ValueEquals(JsonElement) #99994
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow `CborReader` to read from a stream #99993
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generation fails to compile when explicit property names and ignored property names collide. #99988
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Tracking issue for CI build timeouts #76454
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.CancelStopAsync` #94268
    9.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException due to use of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BinaryOperatorKind.Error enum #90331
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Tests.DefaultValueAttributeTests.Ctor_TypeDescriptorNotFound_ExceptionFallback - Exit code was -1073740791 but it should have been 42 #93372
    9.0.0
  • Building helloworld for .NET Core Android #13155
  • JsonNode.ToJsonString can throw when JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver is null #99971
  • Assert failure: pMethodDesc != NULL in tieredcompilation.cpp, when using `RequestReJITWithInliners` profiler API #100024
  • SocketException (10054) while trying to post byte array to a HTTPS server in dotnet 6 with HTTPClient #99724
  • [tvos][arm64][mono] Attempting USB tunnel between the port 56494 on the device and the port 56494 (44764) on the mac: 61 #99649
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) started popping a lot since upgrading to .NET 7 #91571
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' #99929
    9.0.0
  • net 8 console app making use of Microsoft.Extensions.* NuGet Package won't deploy without aspnet runtime #100009
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/ArrayLengthArithmetic/ArrayLengthArithmetic.dll #99884
    9.0.0
  • Rust built WASM library in Blazor project fails on wasm-opt when being published #96394
  • [Tracking] Implement Mono support for Swift calling convention #94081
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] CryptographicException : An unknown chain building error occurred - Failing in test System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #99425
    9.0.0
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #99969
  • [API proposal]: System.CommandLine APIs #68578
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] invocation of user JS in UI thread till next event loop tick #100040
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Test 1es-windows-2022-open Windows build #100038
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix pathing issue for corerun copying in Mono runs #100036
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't log error from background service if host is gracefully stopped while still starting #100032
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #100031
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [browser] further improve HTTP cancelation #100029
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Mark BigMul as AggressiveInlining #100027
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #100025
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NOREVIEW] Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove copy_version_files.sh #100022
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Move Interlocked null checks to managed, RhpLockCmpXchg64 to C #100021
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add basic support for Swift reverse pinvokes #100018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix filtering compressed assets for pdb during publish #100016
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing #100004
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip ro segments which are not in range when walking heap for GC diagnostics #100002
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix regression from test merging #99996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move various thread-local objects that were used in self-contained places out of Thread #99989
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Move SVE helpers to emitarm64sve.cpp #100034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove hasLikelihood checks; make FlowEdge::m_likelihoodSet debug-only #99925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete src/installer/tests/scripts/linux-test #99848
    area-Host
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Fix flags updating when sinking stores below commas #100005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete some unused fields in `CallArgABIInformation` #99972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Move SVE-specific emitIns logic to emitarm64sve.cpp #99983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix detection of exceptionally called funclet in stack walk #99958
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add back NoWarn #99995
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix a mistake in genInstrWithConstant #99948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test (#99915) #99950
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99473
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.30
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99474
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade zlib to 1.3.1 #99475
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.5
  • Use templated encoding helpers for signed and unsigned immediates #99815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove duplicative sorting when enumerating OrderBy.Take/Skip #99973
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Delete TestProjectFixture and associated helpers #99847
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • JIT: Update IL offsets in `fgExpandStaticInitForCall` #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Defer parsing of wasm stack symbolication maps #99974
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change the CryptoKit interop entrypoints to use the Swift calling convention #99970
    area-System.Security
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #99665
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Obsolete invalid AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate* overloads #99985
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
